name: solutions
title: Solutions marker animated
desc:
This is an svg map marker that morphs to different states upon interaction, syncing with page content via hover and page scroll. I converted the vector artwork into dom elements, animated those with native Javascript animation api, styled it, and integrated it with the website.

I love this kind of work because I get to take a static piece thats beautiful on its own to the next level, increasing its appeal to the user.

name: trade-area-prototype
title: Mapping prototype
desc:
This project is a feature that allows users to manage shapes associated with their brick and mortar stores.

I first designed it in Adobe XD for layout, look and feel. Then created this Vue application as a prototype to be used by our product and dev team along with customers to test and receive early feedback.

After it was proven to meet our needs, I helped our dev team implement it into the full application and test it.

name: polygons-toolbar
title: Draw tools
desc:
Here's a toolbar feature to let users draw boundaries for their stores.

I designed this in Adobe XD for look and feel. Then did the markup and styling and created Vue foundational components from that. Finally, I helped our dev team implement and test it.
